Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: , thus drastically minimizing the storage and downloading time requirements of a project. Since the data is stored on S3, users can utilize the boto3 library and s3 get_object method to read the entire content of the object into the memory for processing, without actuall
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use aws-cli to download data from s3://sentinel1-slc/, and then use script tools to cut the files into files smaller than 32GiB and package them into car files. We distribute them to SPs via HTTP or shipping hard disks.
